description.en_US: Fire an arc of star projectiles.
Fire a controllable, sustained volley of piercing stars.
Slam the ground to create an expanding shockwave to hit nearby enemies.
Summon a spinning blade in front of you that both damages enemies and heals allies.
Channel an earthquake that repeatedly hits all grounded enemies in a large area and causes falling rocks.
Attack with a cursed blade. Hits enemies to send them flying but also hit allies to \c[1]sacrifice\c[0] them and absorb \c[2]+20%\c[0] HP.
Dash through your enemies and summon a trail of short-lived Hillkats.
Dash and attack a single enemy, marking them to be pelted by falling stars.
Dash through enemies and leave an army of Hillkats that throw rocks.
Dash and stun a single enemy before calling down a massive star to fall on them.
Perfect guard a melee attack to strike an enemy and inflict them with \c[1]-40% ATK\c[0] for a short time. Stackable.
Enter a trance to \c[2]heal\c[0] yourself and nearby allies over time, lasting until interrupted or canceled. User has \c[1]-20% DEF\c[0] while active.
Perfect guard a melee attack to instantly shatter the attacker and disable them for a while. Target takes damage when they recover.
Provide a \c[1]+20% ATK\c[0] buff for yourself and nearby allies. Slows your own movement speed by \c[1]-25%\c[0] while active.
Shoot three small bomb projectiles that explode on contact.
Shoot a firey star that leaves a lingering trail of fire as it travels.
Attack with a powerful and quick blast of fire to hit enemies in front of you.
Summon a barrage of explosions and follow up with a fire-spweing melee attack.
Dash through your enemies while shooting out short-ranged stars in all directions.
Dash and hit a single enemy, marking them for a moth laser strike.
Dash forward to hit enemies while shooting out flames on either side.
Shoot an arc of flaming rocks that fall down and explode.
Apply a damaging fire aura to yourself and nearby allies.
Twirl your staff to create a powerful fire tornado and falling rocks.
Shoot a barrage of hail bullets with perfect accuracy.
Shoots a piercing icicle bullet. It will remain dormant until the next time this art is used. If given enough time before activating, the bullet will become more powerful.
Perform a slash attack and shoot a wide arc of piercing icicle spikes.
Slash at enemies and follow up with special explosive icicles.
Damage enemies by summoning a large ice chunk. When destroyed, it will release a swarm of bees.
Dash and place a bomb that shoots hail bullets in all directions.
Aim a short-ranged barrage of ice chunks. Grants a frontal shield while active.
Cast a guarding aura in front of you that grants heavy armor to allies. The armor will block \c[3]90%\c[0] of incoming damage.
